pullrequest.title: Use "fixed" joint instead of limited revolute

content.raw:
Good question. Basically, only the guided tutorials are targeted only at the latest release. All other tutorials are versioned and you can see a version box on the top-right.

tl;dr The guided tutorials are a relatively recent addition to the site, the beginner series was [added](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/296/tutorial-1-of-the-beginner-series/diff) last year with the release of gazebo7.
content.html:
Good question. Basically, only the guided tutorials are targeted only at the latest release. All other tutorials are versioned and you can see a version box on the top-right.

tl;dr The guided tutorials are a relatively recent addition to the site, the beginner series was added last year with the release of gazebo7.
